# readValue(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Reads the value for the characteristic.

## Declaration

```swift
func readValue(completionHandler completion: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func readValue() async throws
```

## Parameters

- **completion**: The block executed after the request is processed.



## Discussion

The value is available from the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMCharacteristic/value] property after completion of the request.

## Controlling a characteristic

- **value**: The current value of the characteristic.
- **writeValue(_:completionHandler:)**: Modifies the value of the characteristic.
- **updateAuthorizationData(_:completionHandler:)**: Sets or clears authorization data used when writing to the characteristic.
